accessibility_level.level_1: This place is hard to access even got the help
accessibility_level.level_2: Require help from person and equipment to visit this place

accessibility_level.level_4: This place can access by use of equipment or assistance from another
accessibility_level.level_5: This place can access by use of equipment
accessibility_level.level_6: This place can access by use of equipment or by yourself
accessibility_level.level_7: This place can access without any help
